Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Sahu hai sidhi'am kataram vica kharhe pharisati'am di
Phira jhara jhasa karana vali'am di jhiraka di
Phira unham di jihare upadesa suna'una vale hana
Ki tuhada pujanayoga ika hi hai
Akasam ate dharati da palanahara ate jihara kujha inham de vica hai ate sari'am disavam ate puraba (jithom suraja nikalada hai? Da raba)
Asim sasara te akasa nu tari'am nala saja'i'a hai
Ate hareka vidarohi saitana tom usa nu surakhi'ata kita hai
Uha sarava uca darabara vala kana nahim laga sakade ate uha hareka disa vica mare jande hana
Bhaja'una la'i ate unham la'i ika ata di saza hai
Pratu je ko'i saitana kise gala nu zuka lave tam ika dahikada ho'i'a agara usa da picha karada hai
Isa la'i inham tom pucho ki inham di racana zi'ada kathana hai jam jinham cizam di sirajana asim kiti hai. Asim unham nu cikani miti tom raci'a hai
Sagom tusim hairani pragata karade ho ate uda mazaka kara rahe hana
Ate jadom unham nu samajha'i'a janda hai tam uha samajhade nahim
Ate jadom uha ko'i nisani dekhade hana tam uha usa nu mazaka vica tala dide hana
Ate kahide hana ki iha tam sirafa ika khul'ha jadu hai
Ki jadom asim mara javange ate miti ate hadi'am bana javange tam phira asim' cuke javange
Ate ki sade pichale pi'u dade vi
Akho ki ham, ate tusi' be'izata vi hovoge
Tam, iha tam ika jhiraka hovegi, phira usa samem hi uha dekhana laganage
Ate uha kahinage ki ha'e! Sadi mari kisamata. Iha tam badale da dina hai
Iha uhi nirane da dina hai jisa tom tusim inakara karade si
Unham nu, unham de sathi'am ate unham de pujanayogam nu ikathe karo, jinham ne iha zulama kita
Jinham di uha alaha tom binham ibadata karade sana. Phira unham sari'am nu naraka da raha dikha'u
Ate unham na roko, unham tom kujha puchana hai
Tuhanu ki ho'i'a ki tusim ika dusare di madada nahim karade
Sagom aja tam uha agi'akari hana
Ate uha ika duje nu sabodhana karake prasana utara karanage
Kahinage tusim sade kola saje pasi'um a'unde si
Uha utara denage sagom tusim khuda imana li'a'una vale nahi' si
Ate sada tuhade upara ko'i vasa nahim si, sagom tusim hi vidarohi loka si
Isa la'i sade sari'am ute raba di gala puri ho ke rahi. Asim isa da maza cakhana hi hai
Asim' tuhanu bhataka'i'a, asim khuda vi bhatake ho'e si
So uha sare usa dina saza vica ika dusare de sahibhagi honage
Asim aparadhi'am de nala ajiha hi karade ham
Iha uha loka si jadom inham nu kiha janda ki alaha tom`binham ko'i pujanayoga nahim tam iha hakara karade sana
Ate iha kahide sana ki ki asim ika pagala kavi de kahina te apane pujanayogam nu chada de'i'e
Sagom uha saca lai ke a'i'a hai ate iha rasulam di bhavikha bani di pusati hai
Besaka tuhanu daradanaka saza da maza cakhana hovega
Tuhanu use da badala dita ja riha hai, jo tusim karade si
Paratu jihare alaha de cune ho'e bade hana
Unham la'i tai'a kita rizaka hovega
Meve ate uha bahuta izata nala rahinage
Sukhama'i bagam vica
Takhati'am ute ahamane sahamane baithe honage
Unham de kola ajiha pi'ala li'anda javega jihara vagadi ho'i saraba nala bhari'a javega
Sudha paradarasi pina vali'am la'i savada da'ika
Na usa nala ko'i hani hovegi ate na hi budhi bhrisata hovegi
Ate unham de kola nazara nivim rakhana vali'am ate vadi'am akham vali'am auratam honagi'am
Akham i'um' honagi'am samajho, uha ande hana jihare luko ke rakhe hona
Phira uha ika dusare vala sabodhana ho ke gala karanage
Unham vicom ika kahina vala kahega ki mera ika janu si
Uha kiha karada si ki ki tusim pusati karana vali'am vicom`ho
Ki jadom asim mara javange, miti ate hadi'am ho javange tam ki sanu (kite ho'e da) fala milega
Akhega ki tusi jhaka ke dekhoge
Tam uha jhakega ate usa nu naraka de vicakara dekhega
Akhega ki alaha di sahu tusim tam mainu khatama kara dena vale si
Ate jekara mere raba di kirapa na hudi tam mai unham lokam vica samala huda jihare pharha ke li'ande hana
Ki huna asim marana nahim hai
Paratu pahili vara jihara asim mara cuke ate sanu saza nahim hovegi
Besaka iha hi vadi safalata hai
Ajihi hi safalata la'i karama karana vali'am nu karama karane cahide hana
Iha mahimana nivazi cagi hai jam zakuma (thohara) da rukha
Asim usa nu zalimam la'i imatihana bana'i'a hai
Iha ika rukha hai, jihara naraka di'am jarham vicom nikalada hai
Usa da badala isa tar'ham da hai jivem saitana da sira
Tam uha loka usa nu khanage. Phira usa de nala peta bharanage
Phira unham nu khaul'hada ho'i'a pani mila ke dita javega
Phira unham di vapasi naraka vala hi hovegi
Unham ne apane pi'u dadi'am nu kurahe pi'a hi vekhi'a
Phira uha vi unham de nakase kadamam te calade rahe
Ate uhanam tom pichale ate agale lokam vicom zi'adatara kurahe pa'e hana
Ate asim unham vica vi dara'una vale (savadhana karana vale) bheje
Tam vekho unham lokam da ata kihom jiha ho'i'a, jinham nu savadhana kita gi'a si
Paratu (unham da bahuta vadhi'a ata ho'i'a) jihare alaha de cune ho'e bade sana
Ate phira sanu nuha ne pukari'a tam asim kini cagi pukara sunana vale ham
Ate asim usa nu ate usa de lokam nu bahuta vade dukha tom baca li'a
Ate asim unham de vasa nu baki rahina vala bana'i'a
Ate asim unham de raha ute pichali'am vicom ika samuha (unham di upama la'i) nu jauri'a
Salama hai nuha nu samuce jagata vica
Asim neki karana vali'am nu ajiha hi badala dide ham
Besaka uha sade saradhalu badi'am vicom si
Phira asim duji'am nu doba dita
Ate usa de raha te calana vali'am vica ibarahima vi si
Jadom ki uha apane raba de kola sudha hirade nala a'i'a
Jadom usa ne apane pita nu ate apani kauma nu kiha ki tusi' kisa ciza di ibadata karade ho
Ki tusim alaha tom`binham apane managhare pujanayogam nu cahude ho
Tam sasara de malaka de sabadha vica tuhada ki vicara hai
Phira ibarahima ne tari'am te ika nazara pa'i
Tam kiha ki maim' bimara ham
Phira uha loka usa nu chada ke cale ga'e
Tam uha unham di'am murati'am vica vara gi'a ate kahina laga, ki tusim khande nahim ho
Tuhanu ki ho'i'a tusim bolade vi nahim ho
Phira unham nu puri takata nala torana suru kara dita
Phira loka usa de kola bhaje a'e
Ibarahima ne akhi'a ki tusim inham cizam di puja karade hom jinham nu tusim khuda hi gharade ho
Ate alaha ne hi tuhanu ate inham cizam nu paida kita hai jinham nu tusim bana'unde ho
Unham ne akhi'a isa la'i ika ghara (aganikuda) bana'u. Phira isa nu dahikadi ho'i aga vica suta devo
So unham ne usa de virudha ika cala calani cahi tam asim' unham nu nivam kara dita
Ate usa ne akhi'a ki maim apane raba vala ja riha ham uhi mainu raha dikha'ega
He mere raba! Mainu neka aulada bakhasa
Tam asim usa nu ika sahinasila larake di khusakhabari diti

Isa la'i jadom uha usa de baî€¼rabaî€¼ra calana di umara nu pahuci'a tam usa ne akhi'a he mere putara! Mai' supana dekhada ham ki maim tainu jil'ha (kurabana) kara riha ham. Isa la'i tusi' soca lavo tuhada ki vicara hai. Usa ne akhi'a he mere pita! Apa nu jihara hukama dita ja riha hai apa usa di palana karo. Jekara alaha cahega (inasa alaha) tam tusim mainu sabara karana vali'am vica vekhauge
So jadom dovem agi'akara ho ga'e ate ibarahima ne usa nu mathe de bhara lita dita
Ate asim usa nu pukari'a, he ibarahima
tu supane nu saca kara vikha'i'a hai. Besaka asim neki karana vali'am nu ajiha hi badala dide ham
Yakinana iha ika sapasata imatihana si
Ate asim ika vadi kurabani de badale usa nu chuda li'a
Ate asim usa la'i pichali'am (a'una vali'am nasalam) vica (isarahima di upama la'i) ika varaga nu chada dita
Ibarahima upara salamati hove
Asim neki karana vali'am nu ise tar'ham hi fala dide ham
Besaka uha sade badi'am vicom si
Ate asim usa nu isahaka di khusakhabari diti. Iha ika neka rasulam vico' honage
Ate asim usa nu ate isahaka nu barakata nala nivazi'a ate unham dovam de vasa vica cage vi hana ate ajihe vi jihare apane apa upara pratakha zulama karana vale hana
Ate asim musa ate haruna ute upakara kita
Ate unham nu te unham di kauma nu ika vadim afata tom' mukata kara dita
Ate asim unham di saha'ita kiti tam uha hi jetu bane
Ate asim unham dovam nu ika sapasata kitaba diti
Ate asim unham dovam nu sidha raha dikha'i'a
Ate asim unham de raha te pichale a'una vale samuham vica (unham di vadi'a'i) chada diti
Salama hove musa ate haruna nu
Asim neki karana vali'am nu ajiha hi badala dide ham
Besaka uha dovem sade imana vale badi'am vicom sana
Ate ilayasa vi paigabaram vicom si
Jadom ki usa ne apani kauma nu akhi'a
Ki tusim darade nahim?Ki tusim ba'ala (devate) na pukarade ho ate sabha tom sohane sirajanahara nu chadade ho
Alaha nu jihara tuhada ate tuhade pichale vaderi'am (pi'u-dadi'am) da raba hai
Tam unham ne usa tom inakara kita, isa la'i uha pharhe jana vali'am vica samila honage
Paratu jihare alaha de visesa bade sana (uha saza vica nahim phase honage)
Ate asim unham de raha te pichale hom cuke samuham vica (unham di vadi'a'i) chada diti
Salamati hove ilayasa te
Asi' neki karana vali'am nu ajiha hi badala dide ham
Besaka uha sade imana vale badi'am vicom sana
Ate besaka luta vi paigabaram vicom si
Jadom asim usa nu ate usa de lokam nu bara li'a
Para ika budhi jihari piche rahi jana vali'am vicom si
Phira asim duji'am nu barabada kara dita
Ate tusim savera nu vi unham di'am basati'am vicom laghade rahide ho
Ate rata nu vi. Ki tusim budhi tom kama nahim lainde
Ate besaka yunasa vi rasulam vicom si
Jadom uha bhaja ke bhari ho'i kisati vica pahuci'a
Phira kura'a (paraci pa'una) pa'i'a tam uha dosi nikali'a
Phira usa nu machali ne nigala li'a ate uha khuda nu bura bhala kahi riha si
Jekara uha sifata salaha karana vali'am vicom na huda
Tam usa dina jadom' lokam nu mura jivita kita jana hai, udom taka uha machi de peta vica hi rahida
Phira asim usa nu ika maidana vica pa dita ate uha nidala si
Ate asim usa ute ika velam vala darakhata uga dita
Ate asim usa nu ika lakha jam usa tom vi zi'ada lokam vala bheji'a
Phira uha loka imana li'a'e tam asim unham nu nisacita samem taka labha utha'una dita
Tam unham nu puchom ki tuhade raba la'i beti'am hana ate unham la'i putara
Ki asim farisati'am nu aurata bana'i'a hai ate uha dekha rahe sana
Suna lavo iha loka sirafa managharata rupa vica ajiha kahide hana
Ki alaha aulada rakhada hai yakinana hi' iha jhuthe hana
Ki alaha ne beti'am di tulana vica beti'am pasada kiti'am hana
Tuhanu ki ho gi'a hai`tusim kiho jiha faisala karade ho
Phira ki tusim budhi tom kama nahim lainde
Ki tuhade pasa ko'i sapasata dalila hai
Jekara tusim sace ho tam apani kitaba li'a'u
Ate unham ne alaha ate jinam vica vi risatedari jora rakhi hai. Ate jinam nu pata hai ki yakinana uha phare ho'e a'unnage
Alaha unham galam tom pavitara hai jihari'am iha bi'ana karade hana
Paratu uha jihare alaha de cune ho'e bade hana
So tusim ate jinham di tusim puja karade ho
Alaha tom kise nu mora nahim sakade
Para usa nu jihara naraka vica jana vala hai
Ate sade vicom hareka da ika mithi'a ho'i'a sathana hai
Ate asim alaha de sahamane pagatam vica kharhe rahina vale ham
Ate asim usa di sifata salaha karana vale ham
Ate iha loka kiha karade sana
Ki je sade kola pahilam vale lokam di ko'i sikhi'a hudi
Tam asim vi alaha de visesa bade hude
Phira unham ne usa nu jhuthala dita tam jaladi hi uha samajha lainage
Ate apane bheje ho'e badi'am la'i sada iha nirana pahilam hi ho cuki'a hai
Ki besaka uha hi prabhavasali honage
Ate sadi'am phaujam hi jitana vali'am hana
Tam kujha samem taka unham tom muha moro
Ate dekhade raho jaladi hi uha vi dekha lainage
Ki uha sadi saza la'i jaladi kara rahe hana
Phira jadom uha unham de maidana vica a javega tam unham lokam di savera bari mari hovegi' jinham nu usa tom dara'i'a ja cuki'a hai
Tam kujha samem la'i unham tom muha mori rakho
Ate dekhade raho jaladi hi' uha khuda vi dekha lainage
Tera raba satikarayoga hai ate unham galam tom pavitara hai jihare iha loka bi'ana karade hana
Ate paigabaram nu salama hai
Ate sari prasasa alaha la'i hai jihara sapurana sasara da palanahara hai
